DOC.brief_summary: This randomize , double blind , placebo-controlled multi-center study examine efficacy safety ASP1585 chronic kidney disease patient hyperphosphatemia dialysis .
DOC.brief_title: A Phase 3 Study ASP1585 Chronic Kidney Disease Patients With Hyperphosphatemia Not Dialysis
DOC.criteria: Chronic kidney disease patient ( eGFR < 60 mL/min/1.73 m2 ) Serum phosphorus measurement â‰§4.6 mg/dl , < 9.0 mg/dl Written inform consent Patients gastrointestinal surgery enterectomy Patients severe cardiac disease Patients severe constipation diarrhea Patients history complication malignant tumor Patients uncontrolled hypertension Patients treat parathyroid intervention within 6 month
